text: The food is consistently well prepared and delightful, staff members hands over awesome customer service. I loved how neat it is and mood. Highly recommended.

name: dungBeatle gaming
text: Quite efficient, as their staff is mostly family owned. Their prices might seem expensive at first, but the truth is this place makes food that's worth the price. All in all a great place to treat the family or even yourself.

name: S B
text: 1st time try tonight.  sure hoped it would live up to hype but can't give it more than an average.  5 stars for quick & convenient but the product is what counts.  Bruno's still best in Tyler so far, but only 4 stars there. we'll stick to Dot's in Brownsboro for better pizza & even more convenient.

text: There is no better pizza anywhere.. Service is always friendly and fast and trust me when I say this is no wimpy pizza! You get your money's worth..They pile on the cheese and toppings and one extra large feeds my kids and the neighborhood kids that drop in.. If you haven't tried them give them a try and you will be hook!

name: Andrew R
text: Great crust,  cheese and flavorful, savory sauce (not sweet). Filled to the edge and veggies are diced for easier eating. Fast and friendly service for carryout.
